oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Large chestnut tree in Porters Flats. It is twenty-eight and a half feet in circumference four feet above the ground. Smoky Mountains Hiking Club member Albert Gordon "Dutch" Roth (right) assisting Dr. H. M. Jennison (left) in search of outstanding big trees in the Great Smoky Mountains National Park centenary."
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph taken with a 3A Autographic Kodak folding camera.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Albert Gordon (Dutch) Roth, 1890-1974
